documentation.text:
A Brand registry will keep track of the brands being registered.
 Those brands will hold the metadata, and this trait will hold
 the mean to register such brand with its metadata.

The cost to register a new brand. This can be changed in
 the future and must be able to be known in the ABI for the
 users to be aware of the statistic.

Tells whether the specified user can set the registration
 cost, or not.
An event for when the brand registration cost is updated.

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "BrandRegistry: not allowed to set the brand registration cost"

arguments.value: BrandRegistry: not allowed to set the brand registration cost

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "BrandRegistry: not allowed to set the brand registration cost"

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "BrandRegistry: the brand registry cost must not be less than 0.01 native tokens"

arguments.value: BrandRegistry: the brand registry cost must not be less than 0.01 native tokens

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "BrandRegistry: the brand registry cost must not be less than 0.01 native tokens"
